## About Adobe Captivate
Adobe Captivate stands as a premier authoring tool for creating professional eLearning content that engages learners through interactive experiences and responsive design. The platform empowers instructional designers, educators, and corporate trainers to develop sophisticated learning modules without programming knowledge, leveraging intuitive drag-and-drop interfaces and pre-built templates. Captivate's robust feature set supports the entire course development lifecycle, from initial storyboarding to final publication across multiple delivery platforms and learning management systems.

The desktop application delivers comprehensive authoring capabilities for both macOS and Windows environments, featuring advanced responsive design technology that automatically adjusts content layout for optimal viewing on any device. With support for software simulations, screen recording, and interactive video, Captivate enables the creation of realistic training scenarios that mirror actual software environments and workflows. The integration with Adobe Creative Cloud applications, combined with powerful assessment tools and analytics tracking, makes Captivate an essential solution for organizations seeking to deliver effective, measurable learning experiences at scale.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   8 GB RAM (16 GB recommended)
*   4 GB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   8 GB RAM (16 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
*   4 GB of available storage space
